original_text: “Then you answered me, ‘We have sinned against the Lord. We ourselves will go up and fight, just as the Lord our God commanded us.’ And every one of you fastened on his weapons of war and thought it easy to go up into the hill country.
korean_text: 너희가 대답하여 내게 이르기를 우리가 여호와께 범죄하였사오니 우리 하나님께서 우리에게 명령하신 대로 우리가 올라가서 싸우리이다 하고 너희가 각각 무기를 가지고 경솔히 산지로 올라가려 할 때에

sentences.original_text: We ourselves will go up and fight,
just as the Lord our God commanded us.'
sentences.korean_translation: 우리 하나님 주께서 우리에게 명령하신 대로.'

sentences.original_text: And every one of you fastened on his weapons of war
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 당신들 각자가 전쟁 무기를 챙겨

sentences.original_text: and thought it easy to go up into the hill country.
